channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These families' health care costs will balloon if Congress doesn't act on the ACA
item.description: Millions of Americans face sharply rising costs for health care plans they bought through the Affordable Care Act marketplaces, unless Congress acts s...

item.title: Trump says Democratic lawmakers' video is 'seditious behavior, punishable by death'
item.description: The Democratic lawmakers said that members of the military can and must refuse illegal orders by their superiors.

item.title: 'Nightmare Obscura' author explains how to take control of your dreams
item.description: Sleep scientist Michelle Carr has spent years researching dreaming. She explains dream engineering, including how sensory inputs like light, sound and...

item.title: Judge Temporarily Blocks Trump From Deploying National Guard in D.C.
item.description: Judge Jia M. Cobb found that the presence of more than 2,000 National Guard troops, many from outside D.C., was most likely unlawful. She paused the o...

item.title: Trump Plans to Open More Than a Billion Acres of U.S. Waters to Drilling
item.description: The plan from the Interior Department is one of the president’s most significant steps yet to increase domestic fossil fuel production.

item.title: The CDC revives debunked 'link' between childhood vaccines and autism
item.description: A Centers for Disease Control and Prevention webpage that previously stated "Vaccines do not cause autism" has been changed to cast doubt on the scien...

item.title: Homeland Security Says Border Patrol Operation in Charlotte Is Not Over
item.description: The mayor and sheriff said earlier in the day that the operation appeared to have concluded. But a homeland security spokeswoman said that the effort ...

item.title: Stocks Tumble as Early Tech Rally Gives Way to Worries
item.description: After a week of market uneasiness, Nvidia’s profit surge and Walmart’s earnings had initially offered investors relief. But the bullishness faded by T...

item.title: Recalled baby formula linked to a botulism outbreak may still be in some stores
item.description: A botulism outbreak that has sickened more than two dozen babies in 15 states has been linked to ByHeart formula sold nationwide. Here's what to know ...

item.title: Trump Calling Reporter ‘Piggy’ Was ‘Frankness,’ White House Says

item.title: Trump to Send U.S. Official to G20 in South Africa After All
item.description: The South African president suggested Washington had decided to participate in the summit, despite an earlier claim of a boycott.

item.title: Want to Immigrate to the UK? The Government Says You Must Earn It.
item.description: The government plans to double the period needed for many legal immigrants to become permanent residents, while cutting it for higher-rate taxpayers.

item.title: Ukraine and Europe Chafe at Being Excluded From U.S.-Russian Peace Plan
item.description: Some in Kyiv expressed confusion over the Trump administration’s multiple diplomatic tracks as Washington tries to revive negotiations.

item.title: Ambassador Huckabee Held Meeting With Jonathan Pollard, Ex-Spy, at U.S. Embassy in Israel
